intro.title: Capybot ‚Äì Help Center
intro.description:
**Capybot** is a complete moderation bot designed to efficiently manage your Discord server.

**Main features:**
‚Ä¢ Complete moderation and sanctions system
‚Ä¢ Automatic logs via webhooks (no rate limits)
‚Ä¢ User and channel management tools
‚Ä¢ Blacklist and cases system
‚Ä¢ Advanced voice channel moderation
‚Ä¢ Slash commands (`/command`) and prefix commands (`capy!command`)
intro.footer: Select a category from the menu to view available commands

config.title: Server Configuration
config.description: Commands to configure different aspects of the bot on your server.

welcome_channel.name: Welcome Channel
welcome_channel.value:
`/set welcome [channel] [cooldown]`
Configures the channel where the bot will send welcome messages. The cooldown prevents spam when many users join together (default: 60 seconds).

server_logs.name: Server Logs
server_logs.value_join: `/set join-log [channel]` ‚Äì Logs member joins and leaves
server_logs.value_message: `/set message-log [channel]` ‚Äì Logs deleted or edited messages

moderation.name: Moderation
moderation.value_setmute: `/setmuterole [role]` ‚Äì Selects an existing role for mute

config.footer: All these commands require the 'Manage Server' permission

moderation.title: Sanctions and Moderation
moderation.description: Commands to sanction and moderate users on the server.

warnings.name: Warnings and Mutes
warnings.value_warn: `/warn [user]` ‚Äì Sends a formal warning (reason will be requested via modal)
warnings.value_mute: `/mute [user] [duration]` ‚Äì Mutes with mute role (reason will be requested via modal)
warnings.value_unmute: `/unmute [user]` ‚Äì Removes the mute (reason will be requested via modal)

timeouts.name: Timeouts
timeouts.value_timeout: `/timeout [user] [duration]` ‚Äì Applies native Discord timeout (reason will be requested via modal)
timeouts.value_untimeout: `/untimeout [user]` ‚Äì Removes an active timeout (reason will be requested via modal)

bans.name: Kicks and Bans
bans.value_kick: `/kick [user]` ‚Äì Kicks without banning (reason will be requested via modal)
bans.value_ban: `/ban [user] [days]` ‚Äì Permanently bans (reason will be requested via modal)
bans.value_tempban: `/tempban [user] [duration]` ‚Äì Temporarily bans (reason will be requested via modal)
bans.value_softban: `/softban [user] [days]` ‚Äì Ban + unban to clean messages (reason will be requested via modal)
bans.value_unban: `/unban [user]` ‚Äì Removes an active ban (reason will be requested via modal)

moderation.footer: Require moderation permissions according to the action

cases.title: Cases and Tools
cases.description: Tools to manage moderation cases and channels.

case_management.name: Case Management
case_management.value_editcase: `/editcase [id]` ‚Äì Edits a case's reason (new reason will be requested via modal)

blacklist.title: Blacklist System
blacklist.description: Manage the server's blacklist to record problematic users.

management.name: Blacklist Management
management.value_add: `/blacklist add [user] [severity]` ‚Äì Adds a user with persistent record (reason and evidence will be requested via modal)
management.value_edit: `/blacklist edit [caseid] [new_severity]` ‚Äì Edits an entry (new reason and evidence will be requested via modal)
management.value_remove: `/blacklist remove [caseid] [reason]` ‚Äì Removes an entry leaving a record

info.title: User Information
info.description: Commands to get detailed information about server users.

advanced.name: Advanced Information
advanced.value:
`/user [user]`
Shows complete user information:
‚Ä¢ Overview with roles and permissions
‚Ä¢ Sanctions history
‚Ä¢ Recent voice activity
‚Ä¢ Recent messages
‚Ä¢ Permissions and overrides
‚Ä¢ Trust score (0-100)
‚Ä¢ Statistics (voice time, messages)

voice.title: Voice Moderation
voice.description: Specialized tools for moderating voice channels.

channel.name: Channel Moderation
channel.value:
`/voice-mod channel [channel]`
Shows an interactive panel with all users in the channel:
‚Ä¢ View mute/deafen status
‚Ä¢ Mute/unmute users
‚Ä¢ Move users between channels
‚Ä¢ Mass actions

user.name: User Moderation
user.value:
`/voice-mod user [user]`
Interactive panel for a specific user:
‚Ä¢ View their current status
‚Ä¢ Mute/unmute
‚Ä¢ Move to your channel
‚Ä¢ All available actions

prefix.name: Prefix Commands
prefix.value:
The bot also supports prefix commands `capy!`. Use `capy!help` to see all available prefix commands. Most common commands include:
‚Ä¢ Moderation: `capy!warn`, `capy!ban`, `capy!kick`, `capy!mute`, `capy!timeout`, `capy!tempban`, `capy!history`, `capy!case`, `capy!clear`, `capy!unban`
‚Ä¢ Utilities: `capy!ping`, `capy!help`, `capy!config`
‚Ä¢ Information: `capy!user`

permissions.name: Advanced Permissions
permissions.value_module: `/modconfig module [module] [effect] [user/role]` ‚Äì Configure permissions for an entire module
permissions.value_command: `/modconfig command [command] [effect] [user/role]` ‚Äì Configure permissions for a specific command
